ref: 3172 kiráti ʻ scatters, pours out, sows ʼ RV. &rcirclemacr Pk. kiraï ʻ scatters ʼ; Si. kiranavā ʻ to weigh ʼ (< ʻ *pour out on scales ʼ?). -- As intr. to caus. (see *kērayati): S. kiraṇu ʻ to fall ʼ; L. kiraṇ ʻ to fall (of fruit) ʼ; P. kirnā ʻ to be scattered ʼ. -- Deriv.: L. poṭh. karānā ʻ to winnow ʼ; P. kirāuṇā ʻ to pour down, scatter (seed) ʼ; H. kirānā, kilā˚ ʻ to winnow ʼ.
kcch. kirṇū ʻ to fall down (as fruit from a tree) ʼ,
kcch. kirṇū ʻ to fall down (as fruit from a tree) ʼ,

lang: or mald. Maldivian dialect of Sinhalese
